metadata.title: CVE-2017-8825 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A null dereference vulnerability has been found in the MIME handlingcomponent of LibEtPan before 1.8, as used in MailCore and MailCore 2. Acrash can occur in low-level/imf/mailimf.c during a failed parse of a Ccheader containing multiple e-mail addresses.

criterions.comment: libetpan: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
